channel.title: Security-Tools on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Security-Tools on Arrans github.io

item.title: Infisical/infisical
item.description: Infisical is the open-source platform for secrets, certificates, and privileged access management.

item.title: Zouuup/landrun
item.description: Run any Linux process in a secure, unprivileged sandbox using Landlock. Think firejail, but lightweight, user-friendly, and baked into the kernel.

item.title: Picocrypt/Picocrypt
item.description: A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool.
